title: Soursop, Guyabano, and the Graviola Tree — the Ultimate “Cure” for Cancer?
subtitle: Though chemicals within the fruit have shown potential anticancer properties in the lab, no evidence supports its use as a "cure" for cancer.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The fruit of the graviola tree (soursop or guyabano), or other components of the plant (A. muricata), are a viable cure for cancer.
